li.label: Coiling Strength
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harnesses the serpentine power of precision strikes, coiling through the air with deadly intent. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks are swift and unyielding, bypassing defenses with the unrelenting power of a serpent's bite.

li.label: Slithering Motion
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the smooth, fluid grace of a serpent, weaving through the battlefield with unmatched agility. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes with calculated precision, leaving {PAWN_possessive} enemies in disarray.

li.label: Serpentine Mastery
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands an almost hypnotic presence, drawing creatures and allies to {PAWN_possessive} side with the deadly charm of a serpent. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of those around {PAWN_pronoun} with quiet, compelling influence.

li.label: Coiled Resilience
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures hardships with the resilience of a coiled serpent, waiting patiently before striking. {PAWN_pronoun} stands firm against pain and exhaustion, striking when the moment is right, with unyielding resolve.

li.label: Scaled Defense
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in hostile conditions, like a serpent's scales deflecting attacks. {PAWN_pronoun} is unaffected by toxins, filth, or physical damage, emerging from adversity unscathed and ready to strike.

li.label: Coiled Cuisine
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} skillfully crafts meals with the precision of a serpent's strike, ensuring nothing goes to waste. {PAWN_pronoun} brings sustenance and vitality to {PAWN_possessive} allies, feeding both body and spirit.

li.label: Hypnotic Presence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes the hypnotic allure of a serpent, weaving a charm that captivates and compels loyalty. {PAWN_pronoun} ignites passion in others, drawing them into {PAWN_possessive} circle with a magnetic force.

li.label: Coiling Comfort
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} brings comfort and swift recovery to the wounded, like a serpent wrapping itself protectively around its prey. {PAWN_pronoun} heals with both tender care and unwavering precision, ensuring no ally is lost.

li.label: Coiling Vine
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the land with the careful precision of a serpent's strike, helping new life rise from the earth. {PAWN_pronoun} plants and harvests with quiet efficiency, ensuring the cycle of life continues with each motion.
